content: परत्र {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} In another world, in a future birth; परत्रेह च शर्मणे <ls>R. 1. 69</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 37</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 275</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">5. 166</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 127.</ls> {@--2@} In the sequel, further or later on. {@--3@} Hereafter, in future. --त्रं Future world.
